# Portfolio Website Project

This is a Flask-based portfolio website featuring multiple sections including personal description, links, Steam profile, game reviews, movie reviews, music, diary, and thought of the day.

## Technology Stack
- **Backend**: Python Flask
- **Frontend**: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Bootstrap 5
- **Template Engine**: Jinja2
- **Development**: VS Code with Python extension

## Project Structure
- Flask application with multiple routes
- Bootstrap-responsive design
- Modular template system
- Custom styling and interactive features
- Static file management for assets

## Features
- Multi-page portfolio layout
- Responsive Bootstrap design
- Dynamic content sections
- Professional presentation
- Cross-browser compatibility

## Development Notes
- Use Flask development server for local testing
- All templates extend base layout
- Static files organized by type (CSS, JS, images)
- Modular route structure for maintainability
